mapper.select: SELECT B.BLOG_ID, B.INTRODUCE, B.GRADE, M.NICKNAME, M.GENDER FROM TB_BLOG B JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE B.BLOG_ID = #{blogId}

SELECT B.BLOG_ID, B.GRADE, M.NICKNAME, M.GENDER FROM ( SELECT FOLLOWER_BLOG_ID FROM TB_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWED_BLOG_ID = #{blogId} ORDER BY FOLLOWER_BLOG_ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY ) F JOIN TB_BLOG B ON F.FOLLOWER_BLOG_ID = B.BLOG_ID JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID

SELECT B.BLOG_ID, B.GRADE, M.NICKNAME, M.GENDER FROM ( SELECT FOLLOWED_BLOG_ID FROM TB_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_BLOG_ID = #{blogId} ORDER BY FOLLOWED_BLOG_ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY ) F JOIN TB_BLOG B ON F.FOLLOWED_BLOG_ID = B.BLOG_ID JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_BLOG_ID = #{followerId} AND FOLLOWED_BLOG_ID = #{followeeId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM DUAL
